title: Did the deceased have any other siblings who have one parent in common (half-siblings)?
question: Did {deceasedName} have any other siblings who have one parent in common (half-siblings)?
paragraph1: We need to know about any other half-siblings {deceasedName} had, including any half-siblings who:
listItem1: were legally adopted or given up for adoption by the parent they have in common with {deceasedName}
listItem2: have died, either before or after {deceasedName}
paragraph2: This does not include any step-siblings.

anyOtherHalfSiblings.required: Select ‘Yes’ if {deceasedName} had any other half-siblings
